keywords.term: valine-binding protein from E. coli I. BAG: Uppsala (II)

div.p: The leucine, isoleucine-, valine-binding protein of E. coli is closely related to the leucinebinding protein, LBP, but has distinct substrate specificity. At the present time, there is only a structure of the open, ligand-free form of LIV available. The closed form is that associated with ligand binding, and it is this form that must be studied to allow the specificity to be understood. As both closed and open forms are available for LBP, the conformational changes of these two proteins can also be compared.
Two data sets were collected for LIV in complex with leucine, which will allow a structure to be solved at 2.0 Ã… resolution.
